titleStmt.title: An alarm to all flesh with an invitation to the true seeker forthwith to flye for his life (clearly) out of the short-lived Babylon into the life ... also, a word of encouragement to the faithful to be faithful still / by E.B.
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
Billing, Edward, 1623-1686.
